A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointing. Finn and Rose's story should have been cut completely\, Luke was wasted\, Snoke didn't matter\, it was just bad. It's like no one at Disney watched this before releasing it. I'm astounded that  this film has a 93% score right now. Critics were obviously paid\, threatened\, or have seriously fallen into group think. I was a pretty big fan of The Force Awakens and the new characters\, but The Last Jedi failed to deliver.
